name: Business Development Group SRL
membership: Member of Cluster pRO-nZEB Romania( www.pro-nzeb.ro)
goal: Business Development Group aims to initiate, start and develop innovative actions, platforms and cooperation consortia in the field of water, energy efficiency and circular economy with focus on East- Western Europe cooperation.BDGroup will strive to reduce the gap on innovative solutions and projects in Eastern Europe.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
1. Energy efficiency in Buildings( Build up Skills, Cluster pRO-nZEB)
2. European Innovation Partnership on Water ( EIPWater).
3. Circular economy platforms.
